references.paper_title: Optimal best arm identification with fixed confidence
references.reason: This paper provides the foundational work on best-arm identification in the fixed-confidence setting, which is directly relevant to the Preference-based Pure Exploration problem studied in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Pareto front identification from stochastic bandit feedback
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it tackles the problem of Pareto front identification in multi-armed bandits, which forms the basis for the extension to preference-based exploration considered in the target paper.

references.paper_title: On the complexity of best arm identification in multi-armed bandit models
references.reason: This paper establishes crucial lower bounds for best-arm identification, providing a benchmark against which the target paper compares its proposed algorithm's sample complexity.

references.paper_title: Vector optimization with stochastic bandit feedback
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the vector-valued reward setting of the target paper, providing a relevant comparison point and potential extensions for future research.

references.paper_title: Adaptive algorithms for relaxed pareto set identification
references.reason: This paper presents an adaptive algorithm for Pareto set identification, offering an alternative approach to the problem which the target paper addresses, providing further insight.
